thread.title: PIECE OF CAKE: PAL inaugurates Clark-Davao flight
thread.title_full: PIECE OF CAKE: PAL inaugurates Clark-Davao flight

title: PIECE OF CAKE: PAL inaugurates Clark-Davao flight
text:
PIECE OF CAKE: PAL inaugurates Clark-Davao flight INQUIRER.net / 07:56 AM February 02, 2017 
To celebrate Philippine Airlinesâ€™ (PAL) inaugural flight from Clark International Airport to Davao, a special cake was cut by (from left) Clark Airport president Alex Cauguiran, PAL president Jaime J. Bautista, PAL vice president for Marketing Ria Domingo, former President & now Pampanga Rep. Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo, Pampanga Governor Lilia Pineda, PAL Sr. VP for Airline Operations Ismael Augusto Gozon, and Angeles City Mayor Edgardo Pamintuan. PAL PHOTO 
Philippine Airlines (PAL) celebrated the inaugural flight of its Clark-Davao route with a cake-cutting ceremony attended by airline and airport officials, as well as local politicians in Pampanga. 
PAL president Jaime Bautista led the ceremony with Clark Airport president Alex Cauguiran, Pampanga Rep. Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo and Gov. Lilia Pineda, according to a press statement on Wednesday. ADVERTISEMENT 
The three times weekly direct flight service will use the 199-seater Airbus A321, PAL said. 
The Davao flight is one of four routes opened by PAL from Clark. The others are to Cebu, Puerto Princesa and Busuanga, all using the A321. CBB
